schema.description: Only with "mintable" extension. Returns who can mint and the hard cap on maximum tokens after minting. Return type: MinterResponse.
schema.title: Minter

ui-schema.ui:description: Retrieve information about the authorized minter of the CW20.

ui:options.title: Query Minter
ui:options.description: Retrieve information about the authorized minter of the CW20. This query will return the minter's address and token cap.
